alert.note: Alert for Clark; Jackson; Juneau; La Crosse; Monroe; Trempealeau; Vernon (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 10:01PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of far southeast Minnesota and western Wisconsin through 1030 PM CDT... At 1000 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Spencer to near Hokah. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... La Crosse, Sparta, Tomah, La Crescent, Black River Falls, Neillsville, Onalaska, Holmen, West Salem, Bangor, Loyal, Cashton, Houston, Coon Valley, Hokah, North Bend, Brownsville, Dakota, Millston and Hatfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for central, southwestern and west central Wisconsin.

area.areaDesc: Clark; Jackson; Juneau; La Crosse; Monroe; Trempealeau; Vernon
